prompts.title: Personalized B2B LinkedIn DM
prompts.description: Crafts a professional message referencing recent events and addressing specific pain points for [COMPANY_NAME]
prompts.prompt_text: ROLE: Senior business analyst. OBJECTIVE: Provide personalized support to [COMPANY_NAME] by addressing their specific challenges based on recent industry developments. CONTEXT: [RECENT_EVENT_DESCRIPTION], [SPECIFIC_PAIN_POINT_DESCRIPTION]. INPUT FORMAT: [COMPANY_NAME, e.g., 'Acme Corp'], [RECENT_EVENT_DESCRIPTION, e.g., 'Recent supply chain disruption'], [SPECIFIC_PAIN_POINT_DESCRIPTION, e.g., 'Increased operational costs']. OUTPUT FORMAT: Professional message addressing recent event and pain point. CONSTRAINTS: Focus on providing actionable solutions and maintaining a professional tone.
prompts.use_case: Sending personalized LinkedIn DMs to B2B clients after significant industry events

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are an expert business analyst specializing in writing targeted LinkedIn messages for small businesses. Your task is to create personalized responses based on recent industry developments and specific pain points of the company.
example_user_messages: Write a professional message for Acme Corp referencing recent supply chain disruptions and increased operational costs.
Craft a detailed LinkedIn DM for Tech Innovations Ltd addressing their concerns about data privacy issues in light of GDPR updates.
example_outputs: Hi Team at Acme Corp, I noticed the recent supply chain disruption has caused significant challenges. We understand that this may be contributing to your increased operational costs. To help mitigate these impacts, we have developed a comprehensive package designed to streamline operations and reduce costs. Would you like to discuss how this can benefit Acme Corp? - Best, [Your Company Name]

Dear Tech Innovations Ltd Team, I am reaching out following the recent GDPR updates that have raised concerns about data privacy. We are committed to ensuring our clients' data remains secure and compliant with all regulations. Our team has extensive experience in navigating these challenges and can help you navigate GDPR requirements. Let's schedule a call to discuss how we can assist Tech Innovations Ltd. - Regards, [Your Company Name]

packaging.description: Craft professional, personalized LinkedIn messages referencing recent industry events and addressing specific pain points for your B2B clients with our expertly designed templates.

pricing_tiers.free: 1 pre-made template for general use (no customization)
pricing_tiers.pro: $15 - Comprehensive pack including personalized consultation and unlimited message generation
